GetCellsCount.name: GetCellsCount
GetCellsCount.description: Get the number of cells in the current row.

params.name: nPos
params.description: The cell position in the current table.

SetHeight.name: SetHeight
SetHeight.description: Set the height of the current table row within the current table.

params.name: sHRule
params.description: The rule to either apply or ignore the height value to the current table row. Use the "atLeast" value to enable the SetHeight method use.

params.name: nValue
params.description: The height for the current table row measured in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch). This value will be ignored if sHRule="auto".

SetTableHeader.name: SetTableHeader
SetTableHeader.description: Specify that the current table row will be repeated at the top of each new page wherever this table is displayed. This gives this table row the behavior of a 'header' row on each of these pages. This element can be applied to any number of rows at the top of the table structure in order to generate multi-row table headers.

params.name: isHeader
params.description: The true value will enable the SetTableHeader method use.
